parameters.name: catalog_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of parent catalog for functions of interest.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of functions to return. If not set, all the functions are returned (not recommended).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

parameters.name: include_browse
parameters.description: Whether to include functions in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

200.description: The function list was successfully retrieved.
